# ggplot skeleton

```r
ggplot(data = <data>, mapping = aes(<mapping>)) +
  geom_*(stat = <stat>) +
  geom_*()
```

1. `data`: `tibble` or `data.frame`.
2. `mapping`: aesthetic mappings between data variables and visual elements.
3. `geom_*()`: geometric elements to render each data observation.
4. `stat`: statistical transformations applied to the data.
